verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: told] [ARG2: the U.S. Naval Academy ’s graduating class] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: that the nation is “ respected again ” abroad and that “ We are witnessing the great reawakening of the American spirit] . ”

President Donald Trump told the U.S. Naval Academy ’s graduating class Friday that the nation [V: is] “ respected again ” abroad and that “ We are witnessing the great reawakening of the American spirit . ”
